name: Survival
developer: 重庆第五维科技有限公司
publisher: 重庆第五维科技有限公司
description: FPS games. Players in the game as a soldier is about to enter the battlefield, there is no teammate in the battlefield, only the enemy, as soon as possible to collect surrounding materials to arm themselves, survive to the end to win!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: win7 Processor: I5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 1060GTX DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 15 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: win7 Processor: I7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: 1080GTX DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 15 GB available space
